title: Pro-lifers gain ground
text:
ANALYSIS/OPINION:

The article “Obamacare mandate eyed as a cause for record decline in abortions” (Web, Sept. 18) suggests several reasons for the decline of abortion. One very likely cause is that pro-abortion women are aborting their children who, if allowed to be born, would probably have grown up to be pro-abortion as well. Pro-life women are giving birth to their children and raising them to be pro-life. Therefore, most of the children born in the U.S. since January 1973 are the result of mothers who chose life.

They are the “Pro-Life Generation,” and they intend to overturn Roe v. Wade. I pray for their success. Abortion has already ended the lives of 61 million potential American adults.

ROBERT BOUDREAUX

Gloucester, Va.

Sign up for Daily Opinion Newsletter
